Body:
competences = np.array([[1.0, 1.0, 0.5], [0.8, 0.9, 0.9], [0.15, 0.15, 0.15
    ], [0.0, 0.0, 0.0]])
expected = np.array([[True, True, False], [False, True, True], [True, True,
    True], [True, True, True]])
dcs_test = BaseDCS(selection_method='all')
selected_clf = dcs_test.select(competences)
assert np.array_equal(selected_clf, expected)
